import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { cartSelector } from './main_shopSlice' const Cart = () => { const myCart = useSelector(cartSelector) return (
My cart

My cart

{myCart.length === 0 ? (

cart is empty

) : (

book

price

quantity

total price

{myCart.map(item => (

{item.name}

{item.author}

${item.price}
{item.quantity}
${item.price * item.quantity}
))}
total price$????
) }
) }
Content for the offcanvas goes here. You can place just about any Bootstrap component or custom elements here.
export default Cart
